00037 lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io(lbann_comm *comm, int num_parallel_readers, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers, std::vector<regularizer*> regs)
00038   : input_layer(comm, mini_batch_size, data_readers, regs),
00039     distributed_minibatch_parallel_io(comm, num_parallel_readers, mini_batch_size, data_readers),
00040     Xs(comm->get_model_grid())
00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00044 void lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::setup(int num_prev_neurons) {
00045   if(io_layer::m_data_sets_span_models) {
00046     int stride = Layer::comm->get_num_models() * m_num_parallel_readers_training * Layer::m_mini_batch_size;
00047     int model_offset = Layer::comm->get_model_rank() * m_num_parallel_readers_training * Layer::m_mini_batch_size;
00048     //    cout << "["<< Layer::comm->get_rank_in_world() << "] Setting up input layer, with " << Layer::comm->get_num_models() << " models and " << m_num_parallel_readers_training << " parallel readers and " << Layer::m_mini_batch_size << " mb size, which gives a stride of " << stride << " and my model offset is " << model_offset << " and my base offset is " << (Layer::comm->get_rank_in_model() * Layer::m_mini_batch_size) << endl;
00049     io_layer::setup_data_readers(Layer::comm->get_rank_in_model() * Layer::m_mini_batch_size,
00050                                  stride,
00051                                  Layer::comm->get_model_rank() * m_num_parallel_readers_training * Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00052   }else {
00053     io_layer::setup_data_readers(Layer::comm->get_rank_in_model() * Layer::m_mini_batch_size,
00054                                  m_num_parallel_readers_training * Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00055   }
00056 
00057   Zeros(*Acts, NumNeurons + 1, Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00058   Zeros(X_local, NumNeurons + 1, Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00059 
00060   m_local_data_valid = false;
00061   m_local_reader_done = false;
00062   m_num_data_per_epoch = 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::fp_linearity(
00066   ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&) {
00067   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00068   int num_parallel_readers = get_num_parallel_readers();
00069 
00070   int num_samples_in_batch = fetch_to_local_matrix(X_local);
00071   input_layer::update_num_samples_processed(num_samples_in_batch);
00072 
00073   distribute_from_local_matrix(X_local, Xs);
00074 
00075   Copy(Xs, *Acts);
00076 }
00077 
00081 bool lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::update() {
00082   return is_data_set_processed();
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 int lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::fetch_from_data_reader(Mat &M_local) {
00087   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00088   return data_reader->fetch_data(M_local);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::preprocess_data_samples(Mat& M_local, int num_samples_in_batch) {
00092   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00094   int linear_data_size = data_reader->get_linearized_data_size();
00095   for(int n = 0; n < num_samples_in_batch; n++) {
00096     M_local.Set(linear_data_size, n, 1);
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::update_data_reader() {
00101   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00102   return data_reader->update();
00103 }
00104 
00105 execution_mode lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::get_execution_mode() {
00106   return m_execution_mode;
00107 }
00108 
00109 Mat* lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::get_local_mat() {
00110   return &X_local;
00111 }
00112 
00113 CircMat* lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io::get_dist_mat() {
00114   return &Xs;
00115 }
